fields.name: Rent:
fields.value:
$50X, where X is the number of Renovations you've built on this Property.

Renovations cost $75 each and cannot be built unless you own the full UNO set.

fields.name: Stop-in Effects:
fields.value:
- If you're the owner, you may play an UNO card.
- Otherwise, draw a Green UNO Card.

fields.name: Drive-by Effects:
fields.value:
- Whether this Property is owned or not, you may play an UNO Card if possible.

In order to play an UNO Card, it must either share the same color, the same number, or the same name as the previously played card. (If there is no previously played card, any card may be played.)
